Breadth-First.Explanation: General introduction with no specific hypothesis, preparing to gather clues
Listing man-made objects observed broadly, initial clue collection
Listing natural elements observed broadly, continuing clue collection
Shallow hypothesis generation, listing potential famous beaches
Continuing broad hypothesis generation with multiple location options

Depth-First.Explanation: Focused analysis of the most distinctive clue to verify its significance

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: After broad clue collection, attention converges on the key structure for in-depth analysis
Depth analysis completed without full confirmation, shifting back to broad hypothesis generation
